title: Address Number Type. Any guess which typeface?
content:
This appears to be handmade brass numbers and the curves are just stunning in person. I'm trying to ID it for my blog. If you're from Toronto, this is 320 Bay St.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [320bay3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011072516/http:/typophile.com/files/320bay3_0.jpg) | 14.6 KB |
author: TKDesign

comments.content: For those of us without plans for visiting your fair city any time soon (although I would love to: Toronto is a great place, and we have family living there), perhaps a photo would be helpful...that is, if it's not too much trouble.

Thanks oldnick.  
Strangely enough I attached and previewed before posting.
